Namespace HyperCasualRunner.Interfaces

Interfaces

IInitializable

Every GenericModifier uses this for getting the required T type. For example TransformationModifier get TransformationModifiable via this interface. Player script initializes all the IInitializables.

IInteractor

When you want certain systems to react certain events. For example, Player implements it and when he interacts with something, it disables RunnerMover until interaction ends. In the case of Masters of Count, it's the battling phase.

ITickable

Player ticks all ITickable. It literall acts like a custom Update method.

ITransformator

It's needed when you want to control bunch of gameObjects under one PopulatedEntity. When active child gameObject changes, with this interface, other classes can know the active gameObject, so they can change their targets. For example AnimationModifiable can react to this and changes it's target gameObject for animating.
